item.description:
When you become a "practice-tioner" of Law Of Attraction, you can't help but become immersed in the teachings of Abraham. Esther Hicks, a best-selling author & inspirational speaker, says she dialogues with or "channels" a group of spiritual teachers collectively known as "Abraham."

Through video & audio clips, we'll watch/listen and discuss our impressions & experiences using LoA as taught by Abraham. As always, we'll enhance our discussions with practical “How To”s.

Topics include....

(1) Did you know that there are 2 DVD versions of The Secret? Why was Abraham featured only in the original first version? Why was Abraham not “invited” to Oprah 's TV show & only showcased on her XM Radio show?

(2) What is the Secret Behind "The Secret" that was suppressed? How do you align with this Secret to follow your bliss?

-->We are fortunate that Ann Ide, BostonLOA member & New Possibilities Life Coach, will guide us in a meditation to connect with this "Secret". She will also give us a "gift" to use daily to strengthen the connection.

(3) How do you shift away from “sloppy” thinking to “focused, empowered” thinking in 1 minute or less for blissful living?


*******************************************************
For folks new to Abraham, go here for list of free resources.
Otherwise, SHARE your resources too.

--> http://lawofattractio...

*******************************************************
About Ann Ide:
www.NewPossibilitiesCoaching.com

Ann is a certified master practitioner in Neuro-linguistic Programming (NLP) and Hypnotherapy, and a certified NLP Life Coach with over 15 years experience. Her passion is helping people move beyond suffering and mere survival, and creating “New Possibilities” in their lives for greater harmony, happiness and success. She provides personal and group coaching, guided meditations, and business workshops.

***************************************************************
RSVP "YES" ONLY if you know you are coming.
We usually provide handouts and have appetizers & refreshments. So, to keep "green" & cost down, please RSVP "Yes" only when you can honor your commitment & show up. Many of you have been wonderful with this and we very much appreciate your understanding and support!

**************************************************************
For parking and directions (via T or driving) info to Dave's loft :
(1) Go here: http://lawofattractio...
(2) Sign in
(3) Scroll down and open file "Directions & Parking_BostonLOA Meetup"

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Align with the Secret behind "The Secret" to Follow Your Bliss (Pt 1)
